item.title: [Machine learning] Understanding decision trees from both scikit-learn and mathematics
item.description: #1. Purpose If you want to do machine learning, anyone can use scikit-learn etc. to implement it relatively easily. However, in order to achieve results at work or to improve your level, The explanation “I don’t really understand the background but I got this result” clearly shows the weakness. In this article, the purpose of ** is 2-3, “I will use scikit-learn first because the theory is good,” and 4 and “understand the background from mathematics” **.
